verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Glorify the name of your Lord, the Most High.
verse.verse_4: And Who brought forth the pasturage.
verse.verse_6: Now We shall teach you that you shall never forget it.
verse.verse_7: But whatever Allah wills, undoubtedly, He knows the open and the hidden.
verse.verse_8: And We shall make for you the things easy.
verse.verse_9: Therefore admonish you, if admonition is profitable.
verse.verse_10: Soon he who fears will be admonished.
verse.verse_11: And the evil fated will be away from it.
verse.verse_12: He who will enter the greatest fire.
verse.verse_13: Then he will neither die there is nor live.
verse.verse_14: Undoubtedly, he attained to his goal who purified.
verse.verse_15: And offered prayer remembering the name of his Lord.
verse.verse_16: But you prefer the living world.
verse.verse_17: And the Hereafter is better and lasting.
verse.verse_18: Undoubtedly, this is in the ancient Books.
verse.verse_19: In the scriptures of Ibrahim and Musa.
